titleStmt.title: Unconstant Damon: or Clorinda's languishing lamentation: to a delightfull new tune, or, He that loves best must suffer most. Licensed according to order·

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for P[hilip]. Brooksby, J[onah]. Deacon, J[osiah]. Blare, and J[ohn]. Back.,

notesStmt.note: Date, place of publication and publishers' names from Wing.
Verse: "Some mournful muse attend my quill ..."
